prompts: Create a sleek, blue and white Pokemon with distinctive ears and a confident expression.
Generate a psychic-type Pokemon that has elegant features and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon with a long tail and a charming appearance, perfect for urban settings.
Design a cute Pokemon with a mix of blue and white colors, known for its cleverness.
Show me a playful psychic-type Pokemon with unique whiskers and a striking gaze.
Make a small, agile Pokemon with a soft body and an affinity for forest habitats.
Give me a Pokemon that is both charming and intelligent, dressed in blue and white hues.
